Class JVoiceXmlImplementationPlatform

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
SystemOutputListener, UserInputListener, ImplementationPlatform
public final class JVoiceXmlImplementationPlatform
extends Object
implements UserInputListener, SystemOutputListener, ImplementationPlatform
